title: CNN Center
summary: The CNN Center in Atlanta, Georgia, is the world headquarters of the Cable News Network (CNN). The main newsrooms and studios for several of CNN's news channels are located in the building.  The facility's commercial office space is occupied by various units of the former Turner Broadcasting System, now part of the subsidiary WarnerMedia. The CNN Center is located in downtown Atlanta adjacent to Centennial Olympic Park. The One CNN Center office building was acquired by CP Group, formerly Crocker Partners, and Rialto Capital Management in 2021.
